ygData.subject: Re: negativity
ygData.msgSnippet: I did post in the beginning.  (Under VarinEQ though)  Unfortunately others have much more time to play than I and I am lvl 20.  I often dont have the
ygData.messageBody:
I did post in the beginning. (Under VarinEQ though) Unfortunately others
have much more time to play than I and I am lvl 20. I often dont have the
experience to answer the questions people have about the game. My post did
not mean to attack anyone in particular, just to maybe get people to realize
what the list is transforming into.

----- Original Message -----
From: <jhenders@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, February 03, 2000 4:53 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] negativity


> From: jhenders@...
>
> On Sat, Apr 03/99, SteelWolf <steelwolf@...> wrote:
> > From: SteelWolf <steelwolf@...>
> >
> > Please refrain from posting this sort of rant. It's not someone I want
> > cluttering my inbox. Here's an example for you. If you go to a fine
> > restaurant, then order food, but dislike it intensely, complain to the
> > chef of it's quality, then demand your money back, do you go back there
> > the next night for dinner, hoping the chef has miraculously changed his
> > cooking style to suit you?
>
> Just one point to make here. I've been following this list since June or
> so, and most of what I've read from Kim and Ryan has been useful
> discussion, analysis, and tips on how to play the bard. In fact, they
> are probably 2 of the more prolific posters to the list and I usually
> find the threads they post in to be very interesting. However, the only
> posts I can recall reading from the recent complainers about their
> latest postings are, the complaints.
>
> In other words, if your only contribution to the list is to complain
> when a couple of prolific posters deviate from what you want to hear,
> are you really contributing? Is this list just here for your
> entertainment in read only mode or is it here for everyone to share all
> aspects of the bard class in this game, the good and the bad.
>
>
> --
> Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
> GAT d- -p+(--) c++++ l++ u++ t- m--- W--- !v
> b+++ e* s-/+ n-(?) h++ f+g+ w+++ y*
>
